summary: A test suite that validates the VF2Layout algorithm against multiple quantum backend configurations, exercising circuits of varying qubit counts and topology constraints to ensure correct mapping, handling of unsolvable cases, custom scoring, and errorâ€‘map integration.
business_intent: Confirm that the layout engine reliably produces feasible qubit placements for diverse backend topologies, respects custom distance metrics, detects when no mapping exists, and correctly incorporates error information, thereby guaranteeing robust performance in quantum compilation pipelines.
